page.title: 12NORTH END LIBRARY
page.content: The library was opened on its prese- nt site in Gladys Avenue in 1963 and received a major extension ten years later.It stocks books for all ages and provides local information. Membership is open to all but most library members live locally.It is the second biggest library in Portsmouth, issuing over 301,000 books on its computerized system - a rate of over 150 books an hour! In addition to their services to individual members the library supplies Old Peoples Homes,Community Centres and Nurseries.It also runs a regular story time and craft session for the young and provides special tapes of books for the blind.
